(5)An internal database (“Send Word Now”) processes employee contact information in order to issue emergency notifications.
(6)An emergency notification system (“WebEOC”) processes employee contact information to provide communication between company Emergency Operations Centers during emergency or disaster situations.
(7) A web-based application ("Securimate") processing information about third-party vendors and their employees for the purpose of ensuring compliance with various anti-corruption laws.
(8) A database of Disney patent information ("Lecorpio") used for the purpose of managing and statusing Disney patents.
(9) An emergency notification system ("Everbridge") that stores individual contact information for various Disney Business Units.
(10) An incident tracking system ("PPM") that is used to manage security investigations.
(11) An access control system (“Lenel”) that stores individual contact information for various Disney Business Units in order to track visitors to Disney facilities.
